pilots.name: DIS-T81

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship in the enemy ship's firing arc to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.caption: Predictive Analysis Protocol
pilots.ability: During the System Phase, you may spend your lock on a ship to look at that ship's dial.

pilots.caption: Target Acquired
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may acquire a lock on an object at range 1-3 that has a friendly lock.

pilots.name: Separatist Interceptor

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.text: Deployed late in the Clone Wars, these aggressive starfighters, and the destructive buzz droids they carry, pose a serious threat to even veteran Jedi pilots.

pilots.name: Colicoid Interceptor

shipAbility.name: Networked Calculations
shipAbility.text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship at range 0-1 to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

pilots.text: Designed by the Colicoid Creation Nest and manufactured by Phlac-Arphocc Automata Industries, the heuristic processors of Droid Tri-Fighters allow these deadly ships to analyze and adapt to enemy tactics in-flight.

pilots.name: DIS-T81
pilots.caption: Siege of Coruscant
pilots.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, you may reroll any number of your dice. Then if you were defending, gain 1 strain token for each die that was rerolled. If you were attacking, gain 1 deplete token for each die that was rerolled instead.

pilots.caption: Siege of Coruscant
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if there is an enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc], gain a calculate token

pilots.name: Volan Das

shipAbility.name: Modified for Organics
shipAbility.text: This ship is not affected by the Standardized restriction. Reduce the difficulty of your speed 2 and 3 bank [[Bank Left] or [Bank Right]] maneuvers. Increase the difficulty of your speed 3 turn [[Turn Left] or [Turn Right]] maneuvers.

pilots.caption: Impatient Invader
pilots.ability: After you fully execute a red maneuver, you may chose an enemy ship at range 1. The chosen ship gains 1 strain token and you may remove 1 stress token.
